title: Modules
summary: Overview of high-level modules and responsibilities.

modules.name: Core
modules.description: Primary entrypoint, configuration, and utilities. Use `DiscordClient` to manage lifecycle.

modules.name: Gateway
modules.description: WebSocket connection handling, intents, and event dispatch. Key types: `GatewayClient`, `GatewayModels`, `Intents`.

modules.name: REST
modules.description: HTTP clients, rate limiting and wrappers around Discord REST endpoints. Key types: `RESTClient`, `HTTPClient`, `RateLimiter`.

modules.name: OAuth2
modules.description: Helpers for OAuth2 flows: authorization code, implicit, and client credentials. Use `OAuth2Manager`/`OAuth2Client`.

modules.name: HighLevel
modules.description: Builders, routers, collectors, and convenience utilities for commands, components, slash commands and interaction handling.

modules.name: Models
modules.description: Codable models representing Discord objects: `Message`, `User`, `Channel`, `Guild`, etc.

modules.name: Voice
modules.description: Voice gateway and audio support. Types: `VoiceClient`, `VoiceGateway`, `AudioSource`.
